heading: HB06829
0:
AN ACT RENEWING THE FRANCHISE GRANTED TO NEWS AND ENTERTAINMENT
NETWORK CORPORATION UNDER REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8197 OR “AN ACT
GRANTING THE NEWS AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, A FRANCHISE
TO ESTABLISH, CONSTRUCT, INSTALL, MAINTAIN, AND OPERATE FOR
COMMERCIAL PURPOSES CABLE/COMMUNITY ANTENNAE TELEVISION
SYSTEMS AND MULTIMEDIA SERVICES IN THE PHILIPPINES” FOR ANOTHER
TWENTY-FIVE (25) YEARS FROM THE EFFECTIVITY OF THIS ACT
status: Pending with the Committee on LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES since 2020-05-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06829
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RENEWING THE FRANCHISE GRANTED TO NEWS AND ENTERTAINMENT NETWORK CORPORATION UNDER REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8197 OR “AN ACT GRANTING THE NEWS AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, A FRANCHISE TO ESTABLISH, CONSTRUCT, INSTALL, MAINTAIN, AND OPERATE FOR COMMERCIAL PURPOSES CABLE/COMMUNITY ANTENNAE TELEVISION SYSTEMS AND MULTIMEDIA SERVICES IN THE PHILIPPINES” FOR ANOTHER TWENTY-FIVE (25) YEARS FROM THE EFFECTIVITY OF THIS ACT

DATE FILED : 2020-05-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
